name: Independence Day Bubble Shooter Adventures Pro
name_original: Independence Day Bubble Shooter Adventures Pro
description:
Independence Day Bubble Shooter is Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!
Another classic bubble match-three game come to App Store with USA Independence Day 4rth of July theme.
Clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up,and try to get 3 stars for your country on each level.

How to play:
1.Tap where you want the bubble.
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
Tips: Breaking the bubbles continuously will get you points as bonus.

Features:
32 Beautiful levels with animated Graphics
Independence Day graphics that will leave you spellbound.
Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your country
Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest
Free & easy to play, challenging to master!

Have fun playing Independence Day Bubble Shooter!
